$$
\bar{x} = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^n{x_i} = \frac{x_1+x_2+\cdots +x_n}{n}
$$

$$
x = ( 90, 129, 174, 192, 194, 211, 213, 230, 291, 362) \\
x_1 = 90 \\
x_7 = ...
$$

$$
x = (90, 129, 174, 192, 194, 211, 213, 230, 291, 3627) \\
x_1 = 90 \\
x_7 = 213
$$

$$
\begin{align}
\bar{x} =& \frac{1}{10}\sum_{i=1}^n{x_i} \\
=& \frac{90 + 129 + 174 + 192 + 194 + 211 + 213 + 230 + 291 + 362}{10} \\
=& 208.6
\end{align}
$$

$$
\mathrm{mediana}(x) = x_{(n + 1)/ 2}
$$

$$
\mathrm{mediana}(x) = \frac{x_{(n/2)} + x_{((n/2)+1)}}{2}
$$

$$
\tilde{S}_x^2 = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)^2
$$

$$
\tilde{S}_x = \sqrt{\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)^2}
$$

$$
S_x^2 = \frac{1}{n - 1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)^2
$$

$$
S_x = \sqrt{\frac{1}{n-1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)^2}
$$

$$
var_x = \frac{1}{n - 1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)^2 = \frac{1}{n - 1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right) \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right)
$$

$$
cov_{xy} = \frac{1}{n - 1} \sum_{i=1}^n \left(x_i - \overline{x}\right) \left(y_i - \overline{y}\right)
$$

$$
r_{xy} = \frac{\frac{1}{n - 1}\sum\limits_{i=1}^n (x_i-\bar{x})(y_i-\bar{y})}
            {\sqrt{\frac{1}{n - 1}\sum\limits_{i=1}^n (x_i-\bar{x})^2 \frac{1}{n - 1}\sum\limits_{i=1}^n (y_i-\bar{y})^2}}
$$

$$
r_{xy} = \frac{cov(x,y)}
            {\sqrt{var(x)var(y)}}
$$
